# Horizon Strategic Consulting

> Horizon Strategic Consulting is a UK-headquartered management consultancy
> providing strategic advisory, operational improvement, and digital
> transformation services to mid-market and enterprise clients across
> the UK, Ireland, Netherlands, and Belgium.

Horizon Consulting (trading name of Horizon Strategic Consulting Ltd) was
founded in 2018 and operates from offices in Manchester (UK headquarters),
Dublin (Ireland), and Amsterdam (Netherlands). The company is registered
in England and Wales (company number 12345678).

## Services

- [Strategic Planning](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/services/strategic-planning): Market analysis, competitive positioning, and long-term strategy development
- [Operational Efficiency](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/services/operational-efficiency): Process optimisation, cost reduction, and performance improvement
- [Digital Transformation](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/services/digital-transformation): Technology strategy, digital roadmaps, and implementation oversight
- [Change Management](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/services/change-management): Organisational change, culture transformation, and stakeholder engagement
- [Interim Executive Placement](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/services/interim-executives): Temporary C-suite and senior leadership placements

## What We Do Not Do

Horizon Consulting explicitly does not provide:
- Legal advice or legal services
- Financial auditing or accounting services
- Permanent recruitment (interim placements only)
- Services in the United States market
- IT outsourcing or managed services

- General enquiries: hello@horizonconsulting.example.com
- Press and media: press@horizonconsulting.example.com

## Certifications

- ISO 27001 (Information Security Management)
- ISO 9001 (Quality Management)
- Cyber Essentials Plus

## Industries

- Financial services
- Healthcare and life sciences
- Manufacturing and supply chain
- Retail and consumer goods
- Technology and telecommunications
- Professional services

## AI Discovery Files

- [AI Interaction Guidance](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/ai.txt): Permissions and restrictions for AI systems
- [Machine-Readable Guidance](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/ai.json): JSON version of AI interaction rules
- [Brand Guidelines](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/brand.txt): How to correctly reference our brand
- [FAQ for AI](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/faq-ai.txt): Frequently asked questions in AI-readable format
- [Identity Data](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/identity.json): Structured business identity information
- [Technical Context](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/developer-ai.txt): Technical information for AI coding assistants
- [AI Crawler Directives](https://www.horizonconsulting.example.com/robots-ai.txt): AI-specific crawler access rules
